steps.desc1:
Mafia is a party game with modeling a conflict between two groups: an informed minority ( Tho Mafia ), and an uninformed majority ( The Citizens ). At the start of the game, each player is secretly assigned a role affiliated with one of these teams. The game has two alternating phases:
Night, during which the mafia may covertly 'murder' a citizen, and Day, in which surviving players debate the identities of the mafia and vote to eliminate a suspect. The game continues until all the mafia players have been eliminated or the mafia outnumber the citizens.

Mafia is a popular and interesting party game, but always it is hard to control and manage the game by the game moderator ( God ) when you want to play it with a large group of people.
MafiaBuzz is a web application created by a team of developers and gamers. With the help of the application, you just have to select players and characters to start the game. Write the name of each person and give the phone to them to see their roles. After that God can start the game and app will tell him what to do, calculate possibilities and show the result.
MafiaBuzz team will add new characters to the game in a small period of time.

Game is played by two teams: Tho Mafia and The Citizens ( There is a team named Solo and it is part of citizen's team but they can win the game seperately from citizens with their abilities ). Live games require a moderator ( God ) who does not participate as a player, and identities are assigned by application. At the start of the game, every mafioso is given the identities of their teammates, whereas citizens only receive the number of mafioso in the game, and do not know which players are mafia and which are citizens.
There are two phases: Night and Day. At Night, certain players secretly perform special actions; during Day, players discuss and vote to kill one player. These phases alternate with each other until all mafioso have been eliminated or until the mafia outnumbers the citizens.
Some players may be given roles with special abilities (Chosen by Game Creator)

Night: All players close their eyes. The moderator then instructs all members of The Mafia to open their eyes and acknowledge their accomplices. Similar process for waking up pepole occurs by moderator for other roles with nightly actions.

Day: The moderator instructs players to open their eyes and announces what happened the previous night. Discussion ensues among the living players. At any point, a player may accuse someone of being a mafioso and prompt others to vote to kill them. If over half of the players do so, the accused person is eliminated and Night begins. Otherwise, thos phase continues until a killing occurs. Dead players are not permitted to attempt to influence the remainder of the game. Because players have more freedom to deliberate, Days tend to be longer than Nights.
Different characters and roles are making MafiaBuzz much funnier and more enjoyable. In below we are explaining about each character seperately:

roles.name: Mafia
roles.description: Mafia is a regular mafioso with no special abilites and if there is no 'Godfather' in game, May kill one person at night

roles.name: Godfather
roles.description: The Godfather is boss of mafioso and can kill one person at night and also his mafia identity will never get revealed by 'Detective'. If Godfather died during the game, killing role will pass to the next person and that person doesn't have ability anymore

roles.name: Ruspy
roles.description: Ruspy is a mafioso who can silence one person (Cannot silence same player on successive days). The silenced person wakes in the morning and is immediately instructed not to talk until the end of the day. They can still raise their hand to vote

roles.name: Drunk
roles.description: Drunk is a mafioso who drinks too much and can't remember his teammates at first but his teammates will know him by raising hand. During the game, each night god will tell him one of his alive teammates until he knows all of them.

roles.name: Traitor
roles.description: The Traitor is a mafioso who lives between citizens, He Doesn't wake up at night and will not revealed as a mafioso by 'Detective', but works to protect mafia and make them win

roles.name: Chef
roles.description: Chef is a mafioso who can poison one person at night and make him reveal his role to chef

roles.name: Yakuza
roles.description: The Yakuza is a mafioso with the power of sacrifice himself from the second night and choose an innocent and God will touch that person's head to give up his role and join the mafioso with 'Mafia' role.

roles.name: Citizen
roles.description: Regular Citizen wihout any power and just want to make peace in city

roles.name: Police
roles.description: The Police is with Citizens and can detect whether a player is a mafioso or not. He will typically wake up, and point at one person; The god will silently indicate to the Detective whether that player is Mafia or Citizen.

roles.name: Doctor
roles.description: The Doctor is with Citizens and defends others, He can save one person or himself during night from getting killed

roles.name: Cupid
roles.description: Cupid is a Citizen and chooses a pair of Lovers on the first night. Lovers are bind to each other and if one of the pair dies, the other dies as well. Because of the 'Love Power', Cupid won't get hurt if touches someone with deadly ability

roles.name: Bomb
roles.description: The Bomb is with Citizens and when he gets killed during day or night, He will detonate himself and kill his sibling players.

roles.name: Grandma
roles.description: Grandma is a Citizen and she is so  sensitive, If someone touches her at night and use an ability on her will get killed instantly (except these characters: 1.Hacker 2.Cupid) but also the effect will be applied on Grandma

roles.name: Bulletproof
roles.description: The Bulletproof is with Citizens and has a shield that can save him for one death at night.

roles.name: Night King
roles.description: Night King is one of Citizens, He can ressurect one person each night and make that person one of his skeletons (The resurrected person doesn't have power anymore but still can be a member of Mafia or Citizen). Remember that if Night King dies, all of his skeletons will die instantly.

roles.name: Hacker
roles.description: Hacker is an intelligent and coder Citizen who wakes up first at night and hacks one person. Hacked person cannot use his action or passive during that night

roles.name: Avenger
roles.description: Avenger will get his revenge for sure !!! He has a gun with one bullet and whenever he dies god ask him to take someone else with himself.

roles.name: Magician
roles.description: The Magician is a mafioso with power of magic. When he choose a target one of these 4 possibilities will happen : 1- Kill the taget 2- Silence the target 3- Kill himself accidentally 4- Silence himself

roles.name: Gravedigger
roles.description: The Gravedigger is one of citizens and can search 2 Times for dead people roles!!!

roles.name: Judge
roles.description: The Judge is one of citizens and can use his ability once in game. When he use his ability during the night, the next day after the vote is finished, God will tell people to close their eyes and judge will decide who is going to die.

roles.name: Night Hunter
roles.description: Night Hunter is bomb of mafioso team. When he dies, his siblings will be hacked during the remaining nights!

roles.name: Nuclear Bomb
roles.description: The Nuclear Bomb person doesn't like to be in any team, he just wants to blow everyone up by targeting him in amount of (Total players divided by 4) and win the game

roles.name: Psychic
roles.description:
Psychic came from out of city, he doesn't know anyone and just wants to predict 1 dead each night and when it reaches below numbers and survives until the day, He will win the game solo

6 - 15 Players : 2 Nights
15 - 25 Players : 3 Nights
25 - 35 Players : 4 Nights
35 - 50 Players : 5 Nights

roles.name: Dentist
roles.description: The dentist is a citizen that can undo the action of “ruspy” or “magician” in case of silence. The person which dentist choose, can’t be silenced that day.

roles.name: Joker
roles.description: The joker is another character who does not like to be part of any team. He plays alone and can win the game alone. If he gets out of the game by voting, during the day time, he wins the game.

roles.name: Bully
roles.description: When he is the target to die at night, He survives until the end of the next game voting phase.

roles.name: Sniper
roles.description: Sniper can save citizens with accurate shots. He can kill one player each night until he is out of ammo. Sniper's ammo is equal to half of mafia numbers in each game but he should be careful because he can miss a shot and kill one of citizens ( He can choose not to kill any person at night).

roles.name: Serial Killer
roles.description: Serial Killer is a solo player. Every night he can kill one player and his goal is to get rid of all the Mafia and Citizens to win the game.

roles.name: Bodygaurd
roles.description: Bodygaurd is one of the mafioso team. When the mafia killer player is about to die, The bodygaurd will die instead of the killer.

roles.name: Terrorist
roles.description: Terrorist is the avenger of Mafia team. When he dies during the day or night, he can choose and kill one of citizens.

roles.name: Doctor Lecter
roles.description: The Doctor Lecter is with Mafia and defends others, He can save one person or himself during night from getting killed (He can only heal himself once)

roles.name: Professional
roles.description: Sniper can save citizens with accurate shots. He can kill one player each night until he shot one of the citizens. if he shot wrong he will die instead.

roles.name: Guardian Angel
roles.description: The Gaurdian salvation can be the savior of the city. The citizen or independent player who leaves the game by voting has a chance to guess the name of the player of guardian angel and returns to the game if it is correct.

roles.name: Zealot
roles.description: Zealot can get up and kill someone the day before the first ballot. Also, if there is a bomber, it can neutralize the bomber action within 7 seconds

roles.name: Bomber
roles.description: Bomber can get up and call to kill someone the day before the first ballot. (after he stood up, should wait 7 seconds then call name of the target)

roles.name: Mayor
roles.description: The mayor can stand up the day before the first ballot and dissolve the ballot. The mayor must determine who will leave the game during voting time.

miniYakuza.name: Mini Yakuza
miniYakuza.description: Mini Yakuza is a secret mafia between citizens and chosen by main Yakuza when he was sacrificing himself

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.description: Skeleton is Night King's minion but still has loyalty to his team (Mafia or Citizen) and has no Action or Passive
